title: ZITY 3 Pack Polo Shirts for Men with Pocket Short Sleeve Moisture Wicking Outdoor Tactical Shirt Summer Casual
description: Breathable, lightweight fabric. Moisture-wicking technology that keeps you cool and dry all day long.
These polo shirts are perfect for any occasion from outdoor activity to casual Fridays at the office.
Classic 3-button placket, a loop at the end of the collar opening for pen or glasses, left chest pocket that can store keys, Bluetooth earphones, and other small items.
One package contains 3 pieces short-sleeve polo shirts. We choose a range of classic colors including black, white, blue, and greys, these shirts are perfect for any man's wardrobe.
